comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See geezermusicclub.wordpress.com/2009/11/25/the-mystery-of-k... There's a movie clip on this interesting page from Karen's time as "Eve Young." I think it's the same person, with a different haircut.

comment.author: 57766283@N03
comment._content: Back in 1971 some photographers from Howard University took a photo of me at Malcolm X Park to showcase their work at the Howard Theater....I don't remember their names...I wonder is that's something they may have kept in their archives..How could I see if they still exists since it was hung on the Howard Theater back in the day.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: @sharon.salaam The natural place to start would be to contact the archives at Howard University. www.howard.edu/msrc/archives.htm There's a Contact Us link at the top of the page. Or perhaps you have already tried that.
